entry.title: WIND WARNING , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 08:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind light except north 70 km/h gusting to 90 over southern sections this morning and early this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 30 mm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except southeast 40 gusting to 60 near Bowen Island this evening. Wind becoming north 20 late this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind light except north 30 km/h gusting to 50 over southern sections in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 05 January 2023
